birds.title: Robin
birds.description: The UK's favourite bird - with its bright red breast it is familiar throughout the year and especially at Christmas

birds.title: Goldfinch
birds.description: The chaffinch is one of the most widespread and abundant birds in Britain and Ireland

birds.title: Woodpigeon
birds.description: The UK's largest and most common pigeon, the woodpigeon is largely grey with a white neck patch and white wing patches, clearly visible in flight.
